description: Pre-defined mechanics for core Warhammer 40k abilities. These are standardized rules that appear across many datasheets.

DEADLY DEMISE.name: Deadly Demise
DEADLY DEMISE.description: When this model is destroyed, roll one D6. On a 6, each unit within 6" suffers mortal wounds equal to the Deadly Demise value.

LEADER.name: Leader
LEADER.description: This model can be attached to a unit. While leading a unit, this model's abilities apply to the unit.

DEEP STRIKE.name: Deep Strike
DEEP STRIKE.description: This unit can be set up in Reserves instead of on the battlefield. It can arrive from Deep Strike in your Reinforcements step.

FEEL NO PAIN.name: Feel No Pain
FEEL NO PAIN.description: Each time this model would lose a wound, roll one D6: if the result equals or exceeds the Feel No Pain value, that wound is not lost.

SCOUTS.name: Scouts
SCOUTS.description: At the start of the first battle round, this unit can make a Normal move of up to the Scouts value.

STEALTH.name: Stealth
STEALTH.description: If every model in a unit has this ability, then each time a ranged attack is made against it, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

INFILTRATORS.name: Infiltrators
INFILTRATORS.description: During deployment, this unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from the enemy deployment zone and all enemy models.

FIRING DECK.name: Firing Deck
FIRING DECK.description: Each time this Transport shoots, select up to the Firing Deck value of models embarked within it whose units have not already shot this phase.

HOVER.name: Hover
HOVER.description: This model counts as having the Aircraft keyword for movement purposes but can also make Normal moves, Advance, and Remain Stationary.

LONE OPERATIVE.name: Lone Operative
LONE OPERATIVE.description: Unless part of an Attached unit, this unit can only be selected as the target of a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 12".

FIGHTS FIRST.name: Fights First
FIGHTS FIRST.description: Units with this ability that are eligible to fight do so in the Fights First step, before all other units.
